page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: People in our area sometimes go to church, the most active churches seem to be the Methodist, Catholic and the Church of England. Many people claim to have a religion but few of them attend services except at festival time. People do get married in their churches but do not always attend afterwards. There is a Chatholic school in our area and many churches run Sunday School, all of the traditional religions are represented including a small temple and a Salvation Army meeting house. People enjoy the religious occasions of Christmas and Easter but do not always remember the impliations of them. The ethnic minority religions are represented but their places of worship fall outside our area.
